testcase.name: Images Control
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to webpage.................................................passed Then I should see url include 'https://www.trendyol.com/'...................passed When I closed 'AddPopupCloseBtn' popup form.................................passed And image link control......................................................passed

testcase.name: Success Login Control
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to webpage.................................................passed Then I should see url include 'https://www.trendyol.com/'...................passed When I closed 'AddPopupCloseBtn' popup form.................................passed And I click a 'firsLoginBtn' by 'xpath' web element.........................passed Then I should see url include '/giris?'.....................................passed When I fill 'txtMail' by 'id' textbox as 'testtrendyol@outlook.com'.........passed And I fill 'txtPassword' by 'id' textbox as 'Vardar!123'....................passed And I click a 'btnLogin' by 'xpath' web element.............................passed Then I should see 'myAccountInfo' by 'className' text is 'Hesabım'..........passed And I should see url include '/butik/liste'.................................passed

testcase.name: Login With Invalid User Control
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to webpage.................................................passed Then I should see url include 'https://www.trendyol.com/'...................passed When I closed 'AddPopupCloseBtn' popup form.................................passed And I click a 'firsLoginBtn' by 'xpath' web element.........................passed Then I should see url include '/giris?'.....................................passed When I fill 'txtMail' by 'id' textbox as 'testtrendyol@outlook.com'.........passed And I fill 'txtPassword' by 'id' textbox as 'Vardar!1234'...................passed And I click a 'btnLogin' by 'xpath' web element.............................passed Then I should see 'errorMessage' by 'xpath' text is 'E-posta adresiniz ve/veya şifreniz hatalı.'.passed

testcase.classname: Search Product And Add To Chart Test
testcase.name: Search GamingPC And Add To Chart Successfully
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to webpage.................................................passed Then I should see url include 'https://www.trendyol.com/'...................passed When I closed 'AddPopupCloseBtn' popup form.................................passed And I click a 'firsLoginBtn' by 'xpath' web element.........................passed Then I should see url include '/giris?'.....................................passed When I fill 'txtMail' by 'id' textbox as 'testtrendyol@outlook.com'.........passed And I fill 'txtPassword' by 'id' textbox as 'Vardar!123'....................passed And I click a 'btnLogin' by 'xpath' web element.............................passed Then I should see 'myAccountInfo' by 'className' text is 'Hesabım'..........passed When I fill 'SearchTextArea' by 'className' textbox as 'Oyuncu Bilgisayarı'.passed And I click a 'SearchIcon' by 'xpath' web element...........................passed Then I should see url include 'sr?q=Oyuncu'.................................passed When I fill 'BandTypeSearchTextArea' by 'xpath' textbox as 'Monster'........passed And I click a 'BandTypeCheckBox' by 'xpath' web element.....................passed And I click a 'PriceDropDown' by 'xpath' web element........................passed And I fill 'PriceMinTextSearchArea' by 'xpath' textbox as '3000'............passed And I fill 'PriceMaxTextSearchArea' by 'xpath' textbox as '10000'...........passed And I click a 'PriceFilterSearchIcon' by 'xpath' web element................passed And I click a 'SelectProductItem' by 'xpath' web element....................passed And Switch to new tab.......................................................passed And I click a 'ProductAddToBasket' by 'xpath' web element...................passed

testcase.classname: Search Product And Add To Chart Test
testcase.name: Search shirt And Add To Favorite
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to webpage.................................................passed Then I should see url include 'https://www.trendyol.com/'...................passed When I closed 'AddPopupCloseBtn' popup form.................................passed And I click a 'firsLoginBtn' by 'xpath' web element.........................passed Then I should see url include '/giris?'.....................................passed When I fill 'txtMail' by 'id' textbox as 'testtrendyol@outlook.com'.........passed And I fill 'txtPassword' by 'id' textbox as 'Vardar!123'....................passed And I click a 'btnLogin' by 'xpath' web element.............................passed Then I should see 'myAccountInfo' by 'className' text is 'Hesabım'..........passed When I fill 'SearchTextArea' by 'className' textbox as 'Gömlek'.............passed And I click a 'SearchIcon' by 'xpath' web element...........................passed Then I should see url include 'sr?q=G'......................................passed When Wait '4000' seconds....................................................passed When I click a 'Blank' by 'xpath' web element...............................passed And I click a 'ProductAddFavorite' by 'xpath' web element...................passed And I click a 'GoToFavorite' by 'xpath' web element.........................passed And I click a 'AddToBasketFromFavoriteButton' by 'xpath' web element........passed When I click a 'RemoveFromFavoriteButton' by 'xpath' web element............passed
